description: teacup, ceramic; cat. card dims diam 2-7/8 x H 1-5/8'; canary yellow ground with carmine flowers and landscape in panel; the nick in the paste across the sword mark on the cup indicates that the piece was sold undecorated from the factory;  this decoration was probably done by a contemporary artist in touch with the Royal Meissen methods and techniques
title: Cup and saucer
